wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Lang Elder (18 April 1815 – 5 September 1885) was a Scottish Australian businessman and politician in colonial South Australia.

response: Alexander Elder is a professional trader and a teacher of traders. He is the author of The New Trading for a Living, considered a modern classic among traders.The New Trading for a Living: Psychology, Discipline, Trading Tools and Systems, Risk Control, Trade Management, by Oreilly First published in 1993, this international best-sellerStart Day Trading Now, by Michael Sincere, Simon and Schuster, p. 186Trend Trading for a Living, Second Edition, by Thomas K. Carr, McGraw Hill Professional, , 2018 – p. 12, cit.: "1993 bestseller, Trading for a Living, now deemed a classic in the field, is a highly readable introduction to both the mathematics and the meaning of the various tools used by technical analysts." has been translated into more than a dozen languages and is being used to educate traders around the world. His Come into My Trading Room: A Complete Guide to Trading was named a 2002 Barron's Book of the Year. His Entries & Exits: Visits to 16 Trading Rooms was named a 2007 SFO Magazine Book of the Year. His latest book is The New Sell & Sell Short: How to Take Profits, Cut Losses, and Benefit from Price Declines (2011).
* Alexander Elder, professional stock trader and author in the USA
* Alexander Elder, co-founder of British 19th century publisher Smith, Elder & Co.
